Newest Hero!
Templar Assassin
Login - Register - Feedback
This site is currently in beta stages of development. Some bugs may be present or data missing, if you notice anything wrong or have suggestions for improvements please let us know via the feedback forum or the contact page. All non stat data available is based on the Dota 2 test version and any data mistakes that appear in-game will also appear here. At this stage taking any data found here as 100% accurate is not recommended. We are in the progress of building a rather large site update and stats displayed on the site will be out of date until finished.

Treasure of the Deep Druids

Extra Information
  • Can be opened
Treasure of the Deep Druids
Uncommon Supply Crate
 
Chest Series #4
 
You will need a Treasure Key to open this chest. You can pick one up at the DOTA 2 Store. Each chest series comes with a different selection of possible loot.

Extras

  • Possible Loot (13)
